page.title: 11Recreation Syerston.
page.content:
Entertainment is essentially{home- {spun,}including about four functions a year either in or in connection with the village hall. These are a disco and barbecue, harvest supper, bonfire and fireworks with supper, New Years Eve party and car treasure hunt.
People also like to entertain in the home. The home-made wine circle meets once a month in different homes and dinner parties are held most weekends. All this is made easier by the baby- sitting circle.
Most people own a television, video, radio and hi-fi system. Those with videos frequently get together with a film.
A library van calls once a fortnight.
